org.melior.client.web.rest

Interface RestObjectMapper


  • public interface RestObjectMapper
    Create object mappers for REST requests where the request body is JSON or XML.
    Since:
    2.3
    Author:
    Melior
    See Also:
    ObjectMapper, XmlMapper

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper ofJSON()
      Create an object mapper with functionality for reading and writing JSON to and from basic POJOs (Plain Old Java Objects).
      static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper ofJSON(boolean failOnUnknownProperties)
      Create an object mapper with functionality for reading and writing JSON to and from basic POJOs (Plain Old Java Objects).
      static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper ofXML()
      Create an object mapper with functionality for reading and writing XML to and from basic POJOs (Plain Old Java Objects).
      static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper ofXML(boolean namespaceAware, boolean failOnUnknownProperties, boolean deleteUnresolvedEntities)
      Create an object mapper with functionality for reading and writing XML to and from basic POJOs (Plain Old Java Objects).

    • Method Detail

      • ofJSON

        static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper ofJSON()
        Create an object mapper with functionality for reading and writing JSON to and from basic POJOs (Plain Old Java Objects).

        The new object mapper will fail when encountering unknown properties.

        Returns:
        The object mapper

      • ofJSON

        static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper ofJSON(boolean failOnUnknownProperties)
        Create an object mapper with functionality for reading and writing JSON to and from basic POJOs (Plain Old Java Objects).
        Parameters:
        failOnUnknownProperties - true if the object mapper should fail when encountering unknown properties, false otherwise
        Returns:
        The object mapper

      • ofXML

        static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper ofXML()
        Create an object mapper with functionality for reading and writing XML to and from basic POJOs (Plain Old Java Objects).

        The new object mapper will be namespace aware and will fail when encountering unknown properties or unresolved (general) entities.

        Returns:
        The object mapper

      • ofXML

        static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper ofXML(boolean namespaceAware,
                                                         boolean failOnUnknownProperties,
                                                         boolean deleteUnresolvedEntities)
        Create an object mapper with functionality for reading and writing XML to and from basic POJOs (Plain Old Java Objects).
        Parameters:
        namespaceAware - true if the object mapper should be namespace aware, false otherwise
        failOnUnknownProperties - true if the object mapper should fail when encountering unknown properties, false otherwise
        deleteUnresolvedEntities - true if unresolved (general) entities should be deleted from the XML during processing, false otherwise
        Returns:
        The object mapper
